title: The Peacock Writers Present "A Spooky Fall Harvest"
description: This year's Autumn/Winter Theme is The Fall Harvest. It is a busy time of year and in many cultures it is also a time of reflection. It is time to honor and pray for those lost, to give thanks for the past year's blessings, and to ask for guidance in the next spring season.The Peacock Writers are a group of authors from around the world that join together in the spirit of giving by offering their talents in short stories, poems and artwork.The Peacock Writers and all the proceeds of this book, are dedicated to helping children and the charities that feed, comfort and defend them. Please join them in making children's dreams come true.
author: Alan W. Place
